welcomeScreen.description: Please close the Minecraft Launcher before proceeding.

gameDirScreen.description: I put custom stuff on this screen hahahahahahaha!

launcherDirScreen.description: Please locate the directory in which the Minecraft Launcher is installed.

completeScreen.description: A profile has been created in your launcher called {profile}.

twinFolderWarning:
It is recommended to keep your game files (saves, resourcepacks, etc.) in a separate location for this modpack.
Failure to do so may corrupt your vanilla installation.
